rules_text:
Create two 3/1 red Graveborn creature tokens with trample and haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
Bloodborn 4–{R}{R} [i]({R}{R}: Exile this from your graveyard with four gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
